Assault and PI (Police Officer involved - PSU 3 TSW) IN 165840 & YLDIV 14657.

Preliminary investigation revealed that a group of 10 off duty officers (4 SGT & 6 PC - PSU 3 TSW) was having 宵夜outside a restaurant in three tables, no.75 Ping Wui Street, YL. At 0430 hrs. SGT 58683 had a fierce argument with a TPT PC 34267. In the midst, WPC 13536 tried to mediate but was hit on her head with a bottle by the SGT. Case reported at 0534 hrs. EU and PSUC 3 YLDIV arrived but all parties left. Finally the WPC was escorted to POH for treatment and was granted two day Sick leave. Her head was found swelling. DVC & ADVC OPS TSW were informed. DVC is handling the case right now and she will brief YLDIST senior management in due course. Details of the case is still unclear at this stage pending for further investigation.
Other Officers also involved:-
SGT 6694
SGT 7994
ASGT 70
PC 17589
PC 27075
PC 27830
PC 24686

Preliminary investigation revealed that a group of 10 off duty officers (4 SGT & 6 PC - PSU 3 TSW) was having 宵夜outside a restaurant in three tables, no.75 Ping Wui Street, YL. At 0430 hrs. SGT 58683 had a fierce argument with a TPT PC 34267. In the midst, WPC 13536 tried to mediate but was hit on her head with a bottle by the SGT. Case reported at 0534 hrs. EU and PSUC 3 YLDIV arrived but all parties left. Finally the WPC was escorted to POH for treatment and was granted two day Sick leave. Her head was found swelling. DVC & ADVC OPS TSW were informed. DVC is handling the case right now and she will brief YLDIST senior management in due course. Details of the case is still unclear at this stage pending for further investigation.
